title: ML from Scratch
description: Implemented core ML algos from scratch in Python with visuals and explanations to test my understanding. Used Elements of Statistical Learning for foundations.
highlights: 16 models built from scratch using only NumPy and math
Models rigorously benchmarked against scikit-learn and PyTorch

title: DSA from Scratch
description: Implemented data structures and algos from scratch for practice, and turned this into a visualizer for sorting algos, and a maze generator and solver. Check out the interactive demo.

title: UCLA Dining Recommendation System
description: Full data pipeline and recommender system to help college students hit their macro goals on their meal plan.
highlights: Menu and nutrition scraping with Go
Constraint optimization for menu items based on macro targets, preferences, mood, and dietary restrictions
FeedMe app built on top of this pipeline currently in beta testing for UCLA students

title: Web Scraper Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome extension with AI-powered data extraction and intelligent cleaning, supporting multiple export formats.

title: Quantitative Backtesting Engine
description: A research-grade backtesting framework for quantitative trading strategies with realistic execution simulation and point-in-time data architecture.
highlights: Transaction-based tracking with DCA & partial exits

title: Claude Code Framework
description: Structured workflows for Claude Code. I developed this system when using Claude Code in large codebases, and it is inspired by Boris Cherny's Claude Code workflow.
highlights: Enforced review checkpoints and decision tracking
Built-in custom agent orchestration for reliable implementation, review, and testing
